ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The joint research is part of the general collaboration between Maastricht University, Universidade de Brasilia and Fundação Oswaldo Cruz (Fiocruz). Also the authors would like to acknowledge Anindita Bhattacharjee, Danielly Xavier, Isabel Wolters and Josien van der Kooij for the support in brainstorming and writing of the manuscript.
